title: Cat Breeds Quiz
description: Identify cat breeds from descriptions and characteristics

questions.question: Which cat breed has striking blue eyes, a pale body with darker points on the ears, face, paws, and tail, and a vocal personality?
Which large, fluffy breed is known for going limp when picked up, has blue eyes, and a gentle, docile temperament?
Which breed is one of the largest domestic cats, has tufted ears, a bushy tail, and is often called the 'gentle giant'?
Which breed has a flat face, long luxurious coat, and a calm, quiet demeanor, and has been a favorite since Victorian times?
Which hairless cat breed has large ears, wrinkled skin, and is known for seeking warmth from its owners?
Which spotted breed was created to look like a wild ocelot but has a completely domestic temperament?
Which breed has a distinctive spotted or marbled coat that resembles a leopard's, and was developed by crossing domestic cats with Asian Leopard Cats?
Which breed has short, folded ears that give it an owl-like appearance, and originated from a barn cat in Scotland?
Which stocky breed has a dense, plush blue-gray coat, round copper eyes, and is sometimes called the 'British Blue'?
Which slender, elegant breed has a short, shimmering blue coat, vivid green eyes, and is known for being shy with strangers but loyal to its owner?
Which breed has a ticked tabby coat (each hair banded with color), large ears, and resembles ancient Egyptian cat statues?
Which breed is known for having a naturally short or absent tail, strong hind legs, and originated on the Isle of Man?
Which breed has unusually curled-back ears, can have long or short hair, and was first discovered in California in 1981?
Which large Scandinavian breed has a thick, water-resistant double coat, tufted ears, and was a favorite of the Vikings?
Which breed has a short, wavy coat that feels like crushed velvet, large bat-like ears, and a pixie-like face?
